attributes.action: Immigrant Taxpayers illegible for permanent residence of UK
attributes.additional_details: Exaple if some one lived in this country since 5 years and they have paid enough Tax which compared required standards they might have to illegible for permanent residence of UK.
attributes.background: This petition is for who has lived in UK, and paid Tax in this country need to address by the UK government not even authorised for any public funds what ever Tax they paid or currently paying in UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
